TopicTitle: YCG Channel announcement POLL IS OUT! VOTE FOR A NEW SERIES ON YCG!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, it's been quite a while since my last post advertising my YouChooseGaming YouTube Channel.

For those of you who don't know, My YouTube channel is just a fledgling channel just starting out... no more than 120 views per video.

I was originally trying to create comedy videos but I thought they might be "to lame". And besides, I would love to make cinematics and such as well...

So I created a Straw Poll: http://strawpoll.me/2120777.

C'mon! Take this opportunity to vote for something you want to see! You realise very few YouTubers make polls for this purpose...

I have also created a new Twitter account: @KSP_YCG

Don't forget my Google+ page: https://plus.google.com/105719764347719713080/posts/p/pub

I also posted an announcements video, announcing my new outro, and new intro, and some other stuff.

YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhtBPL1bWG7V8UyLC93g

Videos from now on will be ad-free!

Your comments WILL be read and (hopefully) answered!

We also have a website that provides a list of videos, announcements, and more at: https://sites.google.com/site/kspycggaming/
